Hi! I'm Aidan, a techie consultant turned project manager working for Red Hat.

Welcome to acammies.com! üòä I created this site to be a home for all of the wild and varied things I love to chat about! Including but not limited to: Mental Health/Neurodiversity, Agile ways of work, ADHD, productivity/self-improvement, technical posts, and anything else that can help to make our lives and the world a better place. As with most things in life, this site is a work in progress and I'd love any feedback (head to the contact section or open an issue on GitHub). Hope you have a wonderful day, Aidan
